content: *cute and easy-to-make poncho with a pretty drawstring tie at neck yarnspirations * measurements to fit bust measurements xs/m 28 - 38 71-96 5 cm l/2xl 40 - 50 101 5-127 cm 3xl/5xl 52 - 62 132-158 cm finished lengths from neck to bottom point xs/m 19 5 49 5 cm l/2xl 21 25 54 cm 3xl/5xl 24 61 cm materials bernat denimstyle 100 g/3 5 oz 179 m/196 yds 3 4 5 balls size 6 5 mm u s k or 10½ crochet hook pattern 2-row repeat make two rectangular pieces sew together as shown in assembly diagram provided in pdf download add drawstring to finish english pdf modified july 19 2007 adult poncho to crochet 1 french pdf modified july 19 2007 poncho pour adulte au crochet 2 spanish pdf modified july 19 2007 poncho para adulto tejido a ganchillo 3 1 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_denimstyle001_cr_poncho en_us pdf 2 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_denimstyle001_cr_poncho fr_ca pdf 3 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_denimstyle001_cr_poncho es_mx pdf
